</image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;71075946.1502">   <title>APVEA - call for papers reminder and extension </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;71075946.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Sincere apologies to those on the EuroCALL list for cross posting<br><br>As the reminder is late, the deadline for submission of abstracts to APVEA 2015<br>&lt;http://apvea.org&gt; has been extended to 22nd February 2015.<br><br>The inaugural Asia Pacific Virtual Exchange Association(APVEA) conference will be held at<br>Muroran Institute of Technology in Hokkaido, Japan on July 18&amp;19 2015. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-16T07:05:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Eric Hagley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;71075946.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;de8040ef.1502">   <title>CMC SIG group on ning </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;de8040ef.1502</link>   <description> A ning area on the Eurocall/Calico shared ning is available to all thanks to Randall Sadler. Please pop along and join it. Ning is a more sociable place to connect. You will also find the Virtual Worlds group on the same ning platform.<br>http://virtualworldssig.ning.com/group/cmc-sig   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-11T17:41:48+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Teresa MacKinnon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;de8040ef.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;65949a3a.1502">   <title>Re: Online show and tell! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;65949a3a.1502</link>   <description> Sorry the links didn't work in the previous post. To reserve your place presenting in this event please choose your slot here:<br>https://docs.google.com/document/d/15S8N-dcT45WJwj5djOa0bG5iwyZPL8BVniiqXVYqqO0/edit?usp=sharing<br><br>Even if you would rather lurk, do come along on the day :)   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-11T17:01:20+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Teresa MacKinnon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;65949a3a.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;4080ae12.1502">   <title>Re: Online show and tell! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;4080ae12.1502</link>   <description> There are just 4x 5 minute slots left for this event so claim yours now!<br><br>https://docs.google.com/document/d/15S8N-dcT45WJwj5djOa0bG5iwyZPL8BVniiqXVYqqO0/edit?usp=sharing<br><br>Teresa   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-10T16:45:47+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Teresa MacKinnon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;4080ae12.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;43d6c4ba.1502">   <title>CFP - 2nd International Conference on e-Learning e-Education and Online Training </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;43d6c4ba.1502</link>   <description> 2nd International Conference on e-Learning e-Education and Online Training<br>16-18 September, 2015 - Novedrate (Como), Italy<br>http://eleot.org/<br><br>Scope<br>eLEOT 2015 will focus on e-learning initiatives related to STEM disciplines. We are looking for contributions that range from innovative ways to present information, to mobile-based interactive technologies simulating experiments, to methodologies to manage and study student performance from the back-end, and many more topics. We will also feature space for demonstrations and interactive sessions. More at http://eleot.org/. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-09T18:21:54+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Giovanni Vincenti</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;43d6c4ba.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;249323f0.1502">   <title>Online show and tell! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;249323f0.1502</link>   <description> Eurocall SIGs Computer-mediated communication and Virtual Worlds present:<br>Online show and tell event<br>This 1 hour joint event will be an opportunity to find out about the wide range of activities happening thanks to online networks and the opportunities afforded by computer-mediated communication in language learning. The event will be recorded in Blackboard Collaborate. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-06T16:03:03+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Teresa MacKinnon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;249323f0.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;248a6e11.1501">   <title>New Year, new opportunities </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;248a6e11.1501</link>   <description> Hi everyone. I hope that you all had a good break and are ready for 2015.<br><br>I would like to get some plans for CMC sig activities in place. If you have any ideaas, suggestions or offers please add them to this document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/12gYHtuR8Bz1rExlBYSJ4ULbwUZlA_y0arcc9pThg2y8/edit?usp=sharing<br><br>and we will put a programme together. I have use of a Blackboard Collaborate classroom and would be very happy to record activities we manage to get arranged. Any suggestions for Eurocall 2015 face to face events are welcome too :) [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-06T12:27:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Teresa MacKinnon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;248a6e11.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;a1c86999.1412">   <title>Happy Holidays everyone! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;a1c86999.1412</link>   <description> Just a short message to wish you all a peaceful, restorative break this Christmas.<br><br>Here's a little Christmas present too: http://youtu.be/kBcX9dF93h4<br><br>Enjoy!<br><br>Best wishes, Teresa   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-23T12:55:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Teresa MacKinnon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;a1c86999.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;fe4d6f24.1410">   <title>Re: Minutes and plans for the coming year </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;fe4d6f24.1410</link>   <description> Reminder:<br>Please take a few minutes now to add your CMC connections to the google form I shared earlier. I have set up a thinglink which you can edit yourselves if you prefer. The image comes from Groningen and seemed to me to be a good way of representing the above/below the waterline lives we lead when navigating online and offline connections.<br>http://www.thinglink.com/scene/577167062925836288 [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-18T18:01:46+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Teresa MacKinnon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;fe4d6f24.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;505ed7d0.1409">   <title>Re: Minutes and plans for the coming year </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;505ed7d0.1409</link>   <description> That done ... I thought it worth reassuring that we're not all 'connected'<br>in the same way (myself included), especially professionally when our job<br>appointments don't allow it. So, for example, I've added my data to the<br>Google spreadsheet and you'll see that I'm not particularly present<br>professionally on social media and that I have no official presence on my<br>institutional website. The differences we may find are in and of themselves<br>interesting and worth investigating; we are all engaged in similar<br>activities but have differing degrees of institutional support and<br>influence, which is indicative of the road ahead for [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-19T19:18:22+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sarah Guth</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;505ed7d0.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;3204b4f1.1409">   <title>Re: Minutes and plans for the coming year </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;3204b4f1.1409</link>   <description> Thanks so much Teresa for taking over and moving the SIG forward. I was so<br>sorry not to be there, but look forward to seeing many old and new faces in<br>Padova next year. Thanks also to those who made the effort to be at the CMC<br>SIG meeting.<br><br>I'll be adding my 'social media data' asap. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-19T19:06:17+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sarah Guth</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;3204b4f1.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;be06f611.1409">   <title>Minutes and plans for the coming year </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;be06f611.1409</link>   <description> hi everyone,<br><br>I have written up the minutes from our meeting in Groningen. They are still a work in progress and I have asked some participants to add details I have missed so you may see them updated over time as I did not get the names of everyone who attended. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-17T13:22:59+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Teresa MacKinnon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;be06f611.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;b7458765.1407">   <title>Groningen and changes in leadership </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;b7458765.1407</link>   <description> Dear CMC SIG members,<br><br>I write this with the 21st EUROCALL Conference just a month away. Unfortunately, as I mentioned in a previous email to the list, I will not be able to attend nor will the SIG Secretary Antje Neuhoff. This seems like a great opportunity to turn the SIG leadership over to some 'new blood'. I have asked Teresa MacKinnon, Principal Teaching Fellow at the Language Centre, University of Warwick, who kindly led the CMC SIG meeting at last year's conference, to take over as Chair and she has kindly accepted (thank you Teresa!). I would like to [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-14T19:29:10+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sarah Guth</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMCSIG;b7458765.1407</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
